description: Write n in base 10, complement each digit and juxtapose.
comments: Decimal expansion of 1 minus the Champernowne constant, with offset 0. Example: 0.8765432108988878685848382818... (see A033307). [From _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 31 2009]
mathematica: 9 - Flatten[ IntegerDigits@ Range@ 50] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 01 2014 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
